bylaw.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a law made by a local government that people in that area must obey
bylaw.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a rule made by an organization to control the people who belong to it
bylaw.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a local government law that must be obeyed by the people living in an area, or people visiting it
bylaw.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: a bylaw banning public drinking in the town centre
bylaw.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: a rule made by a company or organization that must be obeyed by the people working for it
